source: Adds a wrapper div to trimmed content. This option is deprecated and will be removed in Smart Trim 3.0.0. Please override the smart-trim.html.twig template file to customize output.
Display More link only when content is trimmed?
Displays a link to the entity (if one exists)
If displaying More link, add a custom class for formatting.
If displaying More link, enter the text for the link. This field supports tokens.
If displaying More link, provide additional context for screen-reader users. In most cases, the aria-label value will be announced instead of the link text. This field supports tokens.
If wrapping, define the class name here.
More link only when content is trimmed
Only display More link if content is actually trimmed.
Provides a more robust alternative to "summary or trimmed" textfield format
Smart Trim implements a new field formatter for text fields (text, text_long, and text_with_summary, if you want to get technical) that improves upon the "Summary or Trimmed" formatter.
Unicode character identifiers of the form \\u2026 allowed.
Use summary if present, and do not trim
Use summary if present, honor trim settings
